verses.verse: James <S%G2385><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Tribes <S%G5443><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dispersion, <S%G1290><s%> Greeting. <S%G5463><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Esteem It, <S%G2233><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Temptations <S%G3986><s%> Ye May Fall Into <S%G4045><s%> Various, <S%G4164><s%>
Knowing <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proving <S%G1383><s%> Of Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Works Out <S%G2716><s%> Endurance. <S%G5281><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Endurance Its <S%G5281><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Perfect <S%G5046><s%> Let Have, <S%G2192><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Be <S%G5600><s%> Perfect <S%G5046><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Complete, <S%G3648><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Lacking. <S%G3007><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Lack <S%G3007><s%> Wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> Let Him Ask <S%G154><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Gives <S%G1325><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Freely, <S%G574><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Reproaches Not, <S%G3679><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Shall Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him : <S%G846><s%>

<S%G154><s%> But Let Him Ask <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Doubting. <S%G1252><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For He That <S%G1063><s%> Doubts <S%G1252><s%> Is Like <S%G1503><s%> A Wave <S%G2830><s%> Of The Sea <S%G2281><s%> Being Driven By The Wind <S%G416><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Tossed; <S%G4494><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Let Suppose <S%G3633><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444><s%> That Man <S%G1565><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Shall Receive <S%G2983><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; He Is <S%G2962><s%>
A Man <S%G435><s%> Double Minded, <S%G1374><s%> Unstable <S%G182><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3598><s%> His Ways. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G2744><s%> But Let Boast <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Low Degree <S%G5011><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5311><s%> His Elevation, <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Rich <S%G4145><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5014><s%> His Humiliation, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Flower <S%G438><s%> The Grass's <S%G5528><s%> He Will Pass Away. <S%G3928><s%>

<S%G393><s%> For Rose <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> With Its <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Burning Heat, <S%G2742><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Dried Up <S%G3583><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grass, <S%G5528><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flower <S%G438><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> Fell, <S%G1601><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Comeliness <S%G2143><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Of Its Appearance <S%G846><s%> Perished : <S%G622><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rich <S%G4145><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4197><s%> His Goings <S%G846><s%> Shall Wither. <S%G3133><s%>

Blessed Is The <S%G3107><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Endures <S%G5278><s%> Temptation; <S%G3986><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Proved <S%G1384><s%> Having Been <S%G1096><s%> He Shall Receive <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crown <S%G4735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Promised <S%G1861><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

No One <S%G3367><s%> Being Tempted <S%G3985><s%> Let Say, <S%G3004><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> I Am Tempted. <S%G3985><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For God <S%G2316><s%> Not To Be Tempted <S%G551><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> By Evils, <S%G2556><s%> Tempts <S%G3985><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> No One. <S%G3762><s%>

<S%G1538><s%> But Each One <S%G1161><s%> Is Tempted, <S%G3985><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Own <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G2398><s%> Lust <S%G1939><s%> Being Drawn Away <S%G1828><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Allured; <S%G1185><s%>

Then <S%G1534><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lust <S%G1939><s%> Having Conceived <S%G4815><s%> Gives Birth To <S%G5088><s%> Sin; <S%G266><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Sin <S%G266><s%> Having Been Completed <S%G658><s%> Brings Forth <S%G616><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%>
<S%G3361><s%> Be Not Mislead, <S%G4105><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Beloved. <S%G27><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> Act Of Giving <S%G1394><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Gift <S%G1434><s%> Perfect <S%G5046><s%> From Above <S%G509><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Coming Down <S%G2597><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Lights, <S%G5457><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not <S%G1762><s%> Variation, <S%G3883><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Of Turning <S%G5157><s%> Shadow. <S%G644><s%>

Having Willed It <S%G1014><s%> He Begat <S%G616><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> By The Word <S%G3056><s%> Of Truth, <S%G225><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Be <S%G1511><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> First Fruits <S%G536><s%> A Sort Of <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> Of His Creatures. <S%G2938><s%>

So That, <S%G5620><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> Let Be <S%G2077><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G5036><s%> Swift <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Hear, <S%G191><s%> <S%G1021><s%> Slow <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Speak, <S%G2980><s%> Slow <S%G1021><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Wrath; <S%G3709><s%>
<S%G3709><s%> For Wrath <S%G1063><s%> Man's <S%G435><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Works Not Out. <S%G2716><s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1352><s%> Having Laid Aside <S%G659><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Filthiness <S%G4507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Abounding <S%G4050><s%> Of Wickedness, <S%G2549><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Meekness <S%G4240><s%> Accept <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Implanted <S%G1721><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Able <S%G1410><s%> To Save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Your Souls. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> But Be Ye <S%G1161><s%> Doers <S%G4163><s%> Of The Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> Hearers, <S%G202><s%> Beguiling <S%G3884><s%> Yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any Man <S%G5100><s%> A Hearer <S%G202><s%> Of The Word <S%G3056><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> A Doer, <S%G4163><s%> This One <S%G3778><s%> Is Like <S%G1503><s%> To A Man <S%G435><s%> Considering <S%G2657><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Natural <S%G1078><s%> His <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Mirror : <S%G2072><s%>

<S%G2657><s%> For He Considered <S%G1063><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Has Gone Away, <S%G565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Forgot <S%G1950><s%> What Like <S%G3697><s%> He Was. <S%G2258><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Looked <S%G3879><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The Law <S%G3551><s%> Perfect, <S%G5046><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Freedom, <S%G1657><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Continued In It, <S%G3887><s%> This One <S%G3778><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> A Hearer <S%G202><s%> Forgetful <S%G1953><s%> Having Been <S%G1096><s%> But <S%G235><s%> A Doer <S%G4163><s%> Of The Work <S%G2041><s%> This One <S%G3778><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4162><s%> His Doing <S%G846><s%> Shall Be. <S%G2071><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Seems <S%G1380><s%> Religious <S%G2357><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%>, You, <S%G5213><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Bridling <S%G5468><s%> <S%G1100><s%> His Tongue, <S%G846><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Deceiving <S%G538><s%> <S%G2588><s%> His Heart, <S%G846><s%> Of This One <S%G5127><s%> Vain <S%G3152><s%> Is The <S%G3588><s%> Religion. <S%G2356><s%>

Religion <S%G2356><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Undefiled <S%G283><s%> Before <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is : <S%G2076><s%> To Visit <S%G1980><s%> Orphans <S%G3737><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Widows <S%G5503><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2347><s%> Their Tribulation, <S%G846><s%> Unspotted <S%G784><s%> Oneself <S%G1438><s%> To Keep <S%G5083><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%>
